attributes.action: Provide more funding for research into a cure for Duchenne/Becker Muscular Dystrophy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I suffer from this dibilating illness which has no has no cure, no real treatments and one outcome - a slow painful early death. This illness wastes all muscles in the body until they no longer function, heart and lung function decrease and eventually fail leading to death in late teens to late 20's. It effects about 1 in 3000 boys.

There is much research going on but more money is needed to help scientests find a real treatment or cure for our generation of children and young adults.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide more funding for research into a cure for Duchenne/Becker Muscular Dystrophy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13671.asp

Prime Minister's Office
